text: Hɨnevɨdaci 6.34 Nam 27.17, 1 Kin 22.17, 2 Sto 18.16, Ese 34.5, Mt 9.36 Jisasɨ nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ kulaŋ hunɨga hɨvɨ u sisɨvavɨmalɨ. Sisɨva Jisasɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali akape agɨladɨ igɨci sabaŋ sipsipɨ iagaŋ apalɨ agɨlaŋ me hɨnevɨmalɨ. Lɨhavɨci Jisasɨ nulɨsaŋ mavɨn hadi lamamalɨ. Lama ciaŋ akape agɨladɨ nulɨsaŋ hɨdɨlɨ maka lamalɨfɨmalɨ.
